oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Non-local Lagrangians: a variational approach to non-local conservation laws for wave mechanics
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Spourdalakis, A. G. B.
Pappas, G.
Kalozoumis, P. A.
Diakonos, F. K.
Schmelcher, P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We introduce a class of non-local Lagrangians which allow for the variational derivation of non-local conser- vation laws in a self-consistent manner. The formalism developed here generalizes previous approaches, used in the context of $\mathcal{PT}$ symmetric quantum mechanics and optics in the paraxial approximation in a twofold way: firstly it is valid for a larger set of linear symmetry transforms and secondly it enables the derivation of additional non-local conservation laws for general higher dimensional wave mechanical systems.
Comment: The paper has been withdrawn due to incomplete formalism. A new version can be found in arXiv:1607.06730
